text: niyata vasayenma visvasa kota (tama vasasthanayen) nikma gos tama dhanaya ha tama jivita allahge margaye kæpa kalavun da tavada sarana laba di (ovunata) udav kalavun da ovungen ætæmek ætæmekuge mituran veti. visvasa kota nikma nogiya aya ovun nikma yana turu ovun samanga kisidu akaraye mitu dahamak numbalata novanu æta. namut dahama visayayehi ovun numbalagen udav pætuve nam numbala ha ovun atara givisumak æti janaya veta hæra (an ayata) udav kirima numbala veta pævarena vagakimaya. tavada allah numbala karana dæ pilibanda va niriksa karannaya
